skills.name: systematic-debugging
skills.description: Structured debugging: reproduce, hypothesise, isolate, fix, verify. Returns to the current phase after resolution.

skills.name: test-driven-development
skills.description: Write failing test first, then implement until green. Primary only for explicit test requests; other phases invoke TDD via skill chaining.

skills.name: brainstorming
skills.description: Ask clarifying questions, explore options, and get user approval before planning. Activated for Build, Modify, and Remove intents.

skills.name: writing-plans
skills.description: Break work into discrete tasks and confirm the plan with the user before execution begins.

skills.name: executing-plans
skills.description: Step-by-step execution of an approved plan. Triggered by explicit plan-continuation language.

skills.name: subagent-driven-development
skills.description: Delegate plan tasks to sub-agents for parallel implementation. Co-triggered with executing-plans.

skills.name: requesting-code-review
skills.description: Prepare and request a code review: summarise changes, highlight risks, open a PR.

skills.name: receiving-code-review
skills.description: Process incoming review feedback: address comments, push fixes, re-request review.

skills.name: verification-before-completion
skills.description: Final verification checklist before shipping: tests pass, lint clean, no TODOs, docs updated.

skills.name: finishing-a-development-branch
skills.description: Branch cleanup and merge: squash commits, update changelog, merge to main.

skills.name: dispatching-parallel-agents
skills.description: Fan out independent tasks to parallel sub-agents and collect results.

skills.name: using-git-worktrees
skills.description: Use git worktrees to enable parallel work on multiple branches without stashing.

skills.name: writing-skills
skills.description: Author and maintain Claude Code skill files (SKILL.md). Meta-overlay for Claude tooling prompts.

skills.name: frontend-design
skills.description: UI/UX design guidance: component structure, responsive layout, styling, and visual prototyping.

skills.name: security-scanner
skills.description: Security analysis overlay: scan for vulnerabilities, OWASP risks, compliance issues, and supply-chain threats.

skills.name: webapp-testing
skills.description: Web application testing: browser automation, accessibility checks, visual regression, and E2E flows.

skills.name: doc-coauthoring
skills.description: Co-author technical documents: proposals, specs, RFCs, and architecture docs.

skills.name: claude-automation-recommender
skills.description: Recommend Claude Code automation setups: hooks, MCP servers, plugins, and workflow optimisations.

skills.name: claude-md-improver
skills.description: Improve CLAUDE.md project files: structure, clarity, and completeness of project instructions.

skills.name: agent-team-execution
skills.description: Team-based parallel execution for plans with independent tasks. Deferred until agent teams exit experimental status.
